definitions.definition: To separate and organize by characteristics.
examples: Please segregate the pairs of shoes by size into their respective boxes.

definitions.definition: To separate, especially by social policies that directly or indirectly keep races or ethnic groups apart.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To separate and organize by characteristics.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , politics ) To separate, especially by social policies that directly or indirectly keep races or ethnic groups apart.
